channel.title: God of War 2-3 (is atlas still alive)
channel.description:
Hades took Atlas's soul with his chains, but when Kratos kills Hades in God of War 3 all the souls are let free, so is Atlas still alive?
Also there are a few other Titans who are marked unknown to death, Epimetheus and Oceanus
Epimetheus falling into a whirl pool and unknown if he escaped Oceanus being pulled off Mount Olympus by Hades, but no one knows what happens after.
Know anything that I don't?
